1.caption_en:
Caption:
A printable "PROBLEM-PRIORITIZATION MATRIX v5.0" worksheet with a stakeholders wheel on the left and a horizontal "PAIN POINTS" scale across the center (high → low), plus multiple blank rows for listing and prioritizing issues.

JSON:
{
  "artifact_type": "worksheet_template",
  "title": "PROBLEM-PRIORITIZATION MATRIX v5.0",
  "version": "v5.0",
  "language": "English",
  "layout_orientation": "landscape",
  "primary_elements": [
    {
      "type": "semicircular_wheel",
      "position": "left_edge",
      "description": "A segmented semicircle for listing stakeholders with a central rounded label",
      "label": "STAKEHOLDERS",
      "segments": 8,
      "fill_color": "light_gray",
      "outline_color": "gray"
    },
    {
      "type": "horizontal_scale",
      "position": "center",
      "description": "A long horizontal bar indicating pain-point priority with an arrow pointing left",
      "label": "PAIN POINTS",
      "end_labels": {
        "left": "HIGH",
        "right": "LOW"
      },
      "fill_color": "very_light_gray",
      "text_style": "bold_center"
    },
    {
      "type": "rows_grid",
      "position": "center_right",
      "description": "Multiple equally spaced horizontal rows for writing problems or notes",
      "row_count": 7,
      "row_dividers_color": "gray",
      "background_color": "white"
    },
    {
      "type": "footer_bar",
      "position": "bottom",
      "description": "Dark blue footer containing title, small copyright/attribution text, logos and a QR code",
      "background_color": "dark_blue",
      "contains": [
        "title_text",
        "attribution_text",
        "logos",
        "qr_code"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "visible_text_snippets": [
    "PAIN POINTS",
    "HIGH",
    "LOW",
    "STAKEHOLDERS",
    "PROBLEM-PRIORITIZATION MATRIX v5.0"
  ],
  "visual_style": {
    "overall": "clean_minimal_printable",
    "colors": [
      "white",
      "light_gray",
      "gray",
      "dark_blue"
    ],
    "lines": "thin_gray_outlines"
  },
  "intended_use": "facilitate stakeholder-oriented prioritization of problems by severity (high to low)",
  "notes": "Blank areas intended for handwriting; footer includes attribution and QR code."
}
